means: 纨绔子弟的，矫揉造作的，举止（或服饰）像花花公子的

sentence.Network_en: He wore a foppish hat, making him easy to find.
sentence.Network_cn: 他戴着一顶流里流气的帽子使他很容易被发现。

sentence.Network_en: Gone was LeBlanc's trademark dark foppish fringe, replaced by a greying head of salt - and - pepper hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 当年那一缕 纨 绔子弟标志的黑色刘海, 如今也已被满头花白头发替代.

sentence.Network_en: He stood out because he wore a foppish hat, making him easy to find.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很引人注目,因为他戴著一顶流里流气的帽子使他很容易发现到.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... snappish 脾气暴燥的 foppish 浮华的，俗丽的 waspish 易怒的，尖刻的.

list.abs: He stood out because he wore a foppish hat , making him easy to find ., 他很引人注目 , 因为他戴著一顶流里流气的帽子使他很容易发现到.

entry.tran: 衣着浮华的;有纨绔习气的;矫饰的
entry.def: If you describe a man as foppish, you disapprove of the fact that he dresses in beautiful, expensive clothes and is very proud of his appearance.

means.word_mean: 1. affecting extreme elegance in dress and manner
纨绔子弟的;矫揉造作的;举止(或服饰)像花花公子的
